title: 21) Notwithstanding anything contained in these Regulations existing 9m
clause_text: 21) Notwithstanding anything contained in these Regulations existing 9m. width of road shall be essential for any height of building above 32
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order
